title: Fresh upgrades from Kogel, K-Edge, Feedback Sports & Yoshimura
content:
Feedback Sports GRVL Grindr rollers? Sea Otter Classic might be late, but it’s not short on new parts from brands big and small. Here’s our first of many roundups, featuring new components and concepts. Above are the prototype GRVL Grindr rollers from Feedback Sports, using sustainably harvested gravel that you can customize to match whatever

The post Fresh upgrades from Kogel, K-Edge, Feedback Sports & Yoshimura appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
